ygData.subject: RE: twinked?
ygData.msgSnippet: You charge 10p for clarity.  Wow most of the enchanters on Veeshan give it away for the asking.  Come to think of it.. no enchanter has ever asked me to pay
ygData.messageBody:
You charge 10p for clarity. Wow most of the enchanters on Veeshan give it
away for the asking. Come to think of it.. no enchanter has ever asked me
to pay for a buff clarity augment, etc.. hehe oh well =)


-----Original Message-----
From: Jonathan [mailto:jpeck@...]
Sent: Friday, February 04, 2000 11:05 PM
To: EverQuest@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] twinked?


From: "Jonathan" <jpeck@...>

Enchanters can make tons of cash just running around casting clarity for 10
plat a pop which is the going rate most of the time.. considering the SoW
costs about 300-400 plat, that's an easy buy after an hour or two of
buffing. Silversilk leggings 100 plat, that's like 20 minutes if that.
Oracle robe is maybe a 1000, but that's not too hard to have accumulated by
level 30.

----- Original Message -----
From: Lanadina the Magician <lanadina@...>
To: <EverQuest@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, February 04, 2000 11:16 AM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] twinked?


> From: "Lanadina the Magician" <lanadina@...>
>
>
> Oracle robe comes off of a level 35 wizard guarded by a 42 guardian
> Silversilk Leggings comes off of a level 45ish mob in Lower Guk
> And Staff of Writhing comes off of a level 40ish mob in Sol B.
>
> Slightly twinked *wink*
>
> Lana
> ----Original Message Follows----
> From: "Shane Bole" <shane0009@...>
> Reply-To: EverQuest@onelist.com
> To: <EverQuest@onelist.com>
> Subject: [EverQuest] twinked?
> Date: Wed, 2 Feb 2000 18:17:16 -0500
>
> From: "Shane Bole" <shane0009@...>
>
> does a 30 enchanter in an oracle robe with a staff of writhing, a few
> quested items, and silversilk leggings sound twinked? Just curious, cause
I
> keep getting handed free stuff... (people helped me on quests but i did
most
> of the stuff)
>
> Fabno Licious, 30th Erudite Enchanter, Ero Marr
